title: 109_hr283
content: Bullying and Gang Prevention for School Safety and Crime Reduction Act of 2005 - Amends: (1) the Safe and Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act to cover bullying and gang prevention. And (2) the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize accountability-based programs designed to enhance school safety, which may include research-based bullying and gang prevention programs.
